name: NEX (itch)
description:
Watch the trailer here!

When all hope is lost. Earth sends a small ship piloted by Nex to find humanity a new home.

Fight hordes of enemies in an intense and difficult bullet hell shooter.

Cut through 3, unique levels as you progressively upgrade your ship to fight a creative boss at the end of each level.

Unlock New Game + mode and Bullet Hell mode to play with previously built ships.

Click the icon in the bottom left to switch between 3 ship designs.

This is my first commercial game, and it wouldn't be possible without the generous help of many people in this awesome game development community.

These people include my friends who helped me to debug the game and Kevin macleod, creator of a tonne of royalty free cc music. If you want the game for free then I will be uploading it to my box.net account later for free, but until then, I would love you to consider helping myself and itch out by purchasing it!
